review_title: A good company for the youth if you want to develop your life skills than hard ones
job_title: Lead Outdoor Instructor in Hạ Long
pros:
- Immediate superiors are supportive, helpful and understanding. They focus on how to create space for their staff members to develop and are open to listening to staff expression.
- A great place for those who don't want to work indoors and build up your own values, life skills.
cons:
- Imbalance between work and life
- Some staff do not respect one another's own lifestyle and privacy
- Intricate management system
- Low wage and no extra payment for Tet and holidays
- Treat staff equally, but do not treat as per abilities
- Human Resources Department exploits staff in every way
